name: Beirutology
tag_list: social-networking, guide-and-directory, beirutna, lebanon, restaurants, pubs, food, beverages, beirut, middle-east, happy-hours, events, reviews, opening-hours, beirut-restaurants, menus
overview:
Beirutna.com is a social networking site integrated with facebook connect for local reviews and recommendations of restaurants and nightlife in Beirut and across Lebanon with information on bars, restaurants, clubs and venues, including Menus, happy hours and events.

Beirutna.com is the goto site where people can easily: â€¢ Locate the best place for spending their day, whether itâ€™s in the morning, at noon, or at night! with Beirtuna.com any venue is one click away! â€¢ Socialize and expand your Friend network with other people with the same or different tastes as you. â€¢ Donâ€™t ever miss another Happy Hour in Lebanon; Know exactly whatâ€™s the best happy hour for you to attend at a specific time. â€¢ Share with your friends your favorite places, Favorite event, Happy hours happening in Lebanon. â€¢ Locate and get detailed information on Restaurants, Night Clubs, Pubs, and Beaches… In Lebanon. â€¢ You type it like it sounds and we find it, donâ€™t worry about typing the exact restaurant name anymore, Beirutna.com will process your request as you type it and provide you with what your looking for. Searching for a restaurant with a hard to spell name has never been easier! â€¢ Furthermore, Beirutna acts as an information and management portal to all restaurants interested to enhance their customer experience.

The startup is a new concept in the region and the country, has great features, even better design and functionalities. Beirutna.com is worthy of your reviews and is a must have in your favorites website.
